overview: Amelia is a young nursing assistant who finds herself without a job; her friend Cecilia (a nurse) proposes that she replace her in the care of an elderly millionaire who is looking for a person to help him. When Amelia goes to don Víctor’s house to introduce herself, she meets a bitter and authoritarian man who treats her with coldness and indifference. The atmosphere of the spacious and elegant house changes little by little when Don Víctor discovers that behind Amelia there is a young woman with a firm personality who is not without sympathy and good nature. And having overcome the initial resistance, Amelia begins to perceive a special interest on the part of Don Víctor and both expand their conversations and speak from their different perspectives of conceiving life and, despite the differences, the relationship becomes closer.
title: La decisión de Amelia
